SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui
Package it.polimi.ingsw.message

Record Class GameStateMessage

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Record
it.polimi.ingsw.message.GameStateMessage
Record Components:
players - A map of player names to their respective colors.
gameOrder - A list defining the order of players in the current game round.
fields - A map associating each player's color with their respective PlayerField.
scores - A map of player colors to their current scores.
cardsBack - A map associating each player's color with an array of symbols representing their back cards.
personalObjective - The personal Objective of the current player.
hand - An array of PlayableCards representing the current player's hand.
commonObjectives - An array of Objectives representing the common objectives of the game.
topResourceDeck - The symbol representing the top resource deck card.
numResourceCard - The number of remaining resource cards in the deck.
topGoldDeck - The symbol representing the top gold deck card.
numGoldCard - The number of remaining gold cards in the deck.
market - An array of PlayableCards representing the market cards.
currentPlayer - The color of the current player taking their turn.
All Implemented Interfaces:
Message, Serializable
public record GameStateMessage(Map<String,PlayerColor> players, List<PlayerColor> gameOrder, Map<PlayerColor,PlayerField> fields, Map<PlayerColor,Integer> scores, Map<PlayerColor,Symbol[]> cardsBack, Objective personalObjective, PlayableCard[] hand, Objective[] commonObjectives, Symbol topResourceDeck, int numResourceCard, Symbol topGoldDeck, int numGoldCard, PlayableCard[] market, PlayerColor currentPlayer) extends Record implements Message
Record representing a message containing the current state of the game.
